result.adr_address: Sichovykh Striltsiv St, 10, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: Cheesesteak

reviews.text: Always fresh and delicious!!! Best cheesesteaks in Kyiv!!

I decided to come anyway and eat these hot dogs that looked great on Instagram. It’s Sunday, it’s freezing cold, I take the girl and go. We arrive, walk in circles for half an hour and can’t do it. To understand where it is, no one answers calls, no one answers messages either on Instagram or on Facebook. They froze, got upset and left, I wrote a comment under the last post because it was really disappointing to travel from the other end of the city to be left with nothing like that.
The next day they answered me that it turned out they had a sanitary day, which they miraculously forgot to warn about, and offered a discount as an apology.
A month later we decided to go for a walk, my girlfriend’s friend joined us and I offered to call a taxi straight to the cheesesteak and from there go to the landscape. We arrived, thank God it was open, but I looked, in reality, as was written above, the room is 2 by 2, there is nowhere to sit, I think, well, at least the discount makes me happy. But even here, not everything is so simple, the girl who was on shift was terribly scared by the word “promotional code” and said that she needed to find out if it was possible to do this. In 15 minutes she still couldn’t get through to anyone and I screwed up for the second time in front of the girl, and now also in front of her friend.
To be honest, it seems like the owner of the establishment just threw money into it, and he doesn’t really care what happens next.
I do not recommend it in any way. The service is poor, there is no establishment like it, the prices are sky-high. This time, unfortunately, it will not be possible to delete the comment :(
Very tasty!! Marvelous! Thank you for being there!!

I tried it. Guys, wake up! 195 hryvnia for a hot dog with beef. Dry and without sauce with an incomprehensible pinch of cheese! Where does this pricing come from??? For what??? You rent two square meters in the basement!
I won’t come again and I don’t recommend it! Not worth the money!!!

The appearance of the dish speaks for itself. I ordered delivery of The Cheeseteake from Bolt Food, the app contains, as always, appetizing photos, the composition of the dish is described....result: tomatoes were absent, mushrooms were present (absolutely nothing was mentioned about them in the description in the app, for people who don’t eat mushrooms - this nuance is important), the bun was overdried and burnt, all this is a pitiful and tasteless spectacle at a price of 175 UAH. I complained to Bolt Food - they compensated me 50 UAH!) I found an establishment where they prepared a “work of art” - the person communicates in a rude manner, absolutely unprofessional, with the phrases “hear, cat” and “we really hope that you have nothing more with us, never order." No solution to the current situation was offered, but only justifications along the lines of “Girl, would you know what the cost of this dish is...” I don’t recommend it to anyone!
